text: @Migraine_ResearchExciting news for migraine sufferers! 🤩 New data reveals that atogepant, an oral calcitonin gene-related peptide receptor antagonist, significantly reduces monthly migraine days. 70% of patients achieved a 50% reduction in migraines with daily 60mg doses! 💊👍The study showed sustained efficacy over 48 weeks, with an average 8.5-day reduction in monthly migraine days. 📉💯This 1-year data provides hope for patients and clinicians alike! 🌟 What are your thoughts on this breakthrough? Share your experiences or questions below! 💬
